title: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes does not show busy cursor
description: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)1.
OB: When updating the checked state of the table, it takes a long time (around 30 seconds in my case) and no busy cursor is shown.
EB: The software should display a busy cursor while updating the checked state of the table during the Export Zip process.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Perform the Export Zip process.
2. Observe the absence of a busy cursor during the updating of the checkboxes on the table.
